{% endraw %} {% raw %}

parse_date[source]

parse_date(date_string)

Tests a date string against a list of expected formats. If a known format is found, the date is refromatted as an ISO date.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

process_date_string[source]

process_date_string(date_string, prefix='')

Takes a date range in a string and returns ISO formatted start and end dates.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_url[source]

get_url(url)

Get a RecordSearch page, setting up a session and handling the weird redirects.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_digitised_pages[source]

get_digitised_pages(identifier)

Returns the number of pages (images) in a digitised file. This is scraped from the RecordSearch digitised file viewer. The file viewer is outside of RecordSearch's session system, so it can be requested directly.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RSEntity[source]

RSEntity(identifier=None, **kwargs)

Base class for individual RecordSearch entities – item, series, or agency. Not for direct use – use the appropriate subclass instead.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RSItem[source]

RSItem(identifier=None, details=None) :: RSEntity

Class used for extracting data about an individual item (usually a file, but can be a volume, box, photograph etc) from RecordSearch. Supply an Item ID (aka barcode).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RSSeries[source]

RSSeries(identifier=None) :: RSEntity

Base class for individual RecordSearch entities – item, series, or agency. Not for direct use – use the appropriate subclass instead.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RSSearch[source]

RSSearch(page=None, results_per_page=None, sort=None, record_detail='brief', **kwargs)

Base class for an advanced search in RecordSearch. There are different search forms for the different RecordSearch entities, so don't use this directly. Use one of the subclasses.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class RSItemSearch[source]

RSItemSearch(page=None, results_per_page=None, sort=None, record_detail='brief', **kwargs) :: RSSearch

Base class for an advanced search in RecordSearch. There are different search forms for the different RecordSearch entities, so don't use this directly. Use one of the subclasses.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
